name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a results-driven Senior Electrical Engineer with 8+ years of experience, I excel in Project Leadership and mentoring, leveraging skills in Relay Coordination and Quality Checks to ensure robust designs and implementations. My background includes proficiency in **AutoCAD**, **MicroStation**, and **SCADA**, enabling the seamless execution of complex electrical projects. I have a strong focus on Bus Design and Grounding techniques, fostering communication and collaboration among cross-functional teams. I am dedicated to delivering high-quality, efficient solutions while driving continuous improvement and innovation in the engineering process.
